commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: What was the point of everything I did leading up to now?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I couldn't retain my student council presidency, and I couldn't protect the club that I quit against everyone's wishes.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: What's there left for me to do? I want to at least be of use to everyone...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There she is! Everyone, I found Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Setsu! We've been looking for you!

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Huh? What?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Geez! What are you doing moping about around here, Setsuna?!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* We were afraid we might not see you again after that.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Oh, um, sorry.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: We thought we'd wait until your emotions settled a little, but...

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Oh... I'm sorry I lost the student council election! I will try to negotiate again with Shioriko so that the club isn't abolished, so...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Who cares about that!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's right, Setsuna. That doesn't matter right now.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We were searching the whole school for you! It was like we'd set off on a wild Setsu chase!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We wanted to see you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Look at this, Setsuna. I'm usually fast asleep around this time of day, but I'm awake and bright-eyed!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Everyone wants to be by your side.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, let's head back to the clubroom.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: No, I can't do that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Thank you very much for coming to look for me. However, I am unworthy of your concern.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I lost the student council election and I couldn't protect the club. I also said horrible things to you, so I can't just...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: S-Setsuna, you're an idiot!

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're an idiot, so that's what I called you! It's not like you to constantly be so dishonest to your own feelings!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You always took on everything you loved head-on!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You love being a school idol, right? The Setsuna we love always gives it her all for the things that she loves.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So let's do what we love, together. Let me cheer for the Setsuna who shines from doing what she loves. The school idol Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: B-But I lost, so the School Idol Club will be...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Setsuna, have you already forgotten about that time the club was in danger of being abolished? About how I stuck to my guns and came out victorious?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* That's right. I got the chance to become a school idol thanks to you, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Then we just need to do the same thing again.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: G-Girls...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: No matter what lengths Mifune goes to, we won't go down without a fight!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: But if we're going to battle against the student council president, it'd be better if we had more people, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's right. You're our friend, so you gotta help us!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm not gonna let anyone crush our beloved club that easily! I'll fight her tooth and nail!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: So please come back, Setsuna.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This place, the club, is your favorite place. Isn't that right, Setsuna?!

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: G-Girls... I-I want to go back to all of you! I want to be a school idol together with you all!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And we're more than happy to have you back. Welcome back!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Welcome back!

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Glad to be back!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I feel uneasy since I haven't dressed like this for a while.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup, this is the Setsuna we know!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Th-Thank you very much.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Have you spoken to your parents about what happened, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I gave them a thorough explanation last night.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did it go well? You mentioned before that if you lost your presidency then it might be difficult for you to make time to be a school idol, right?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I intend to go over everything calmly with them, including that. I don't expect them to be understanding straight away since I have been hiding things from them.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But I think this is the perfect opportunity to do so. I can't say that I didn't feel guilty about being secretive, and I do want my parents to support me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? That's good to hear... But I do want you to talk to me if anything comes up. Can you promise me that?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Okay.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, Setsuna! You've only just come back and you go ahead and plant yourself right there?! I'll let you off this time, but tomorrow, I get the seat next to the club president!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Laugh* I've missed being in this environment! It's so much fun!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's been a while since I've seen you smile. Rina-chan Board says, "Smiles, smiles, all around."

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Okay, okay. Everyone, time to refocus.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I figured we'd get back into preparations for the School Idol Festival since Setsuna's back, but...maybe we should think about keeping the club alive first.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Mifune is a logical person, so perhaps she'll let us keep the club open if we explain to her that it is a necessary part of this school.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then all the more reason for us to make the School Idol Festival happen.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: She needs to see that we have the skills to perform on the main stage of such a huge event.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And it'll also be a huge plus for the school if the Nijigasaki High School name gets spread through the Festival.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I think it is necessary to explain how beneficial the club is to the school in logical terms to convince her.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whaaat? She won't just give us recognition by watching us perform in front of her as school idols?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: We do need her to actually watch us. However, I don't think she will give us the time of day unless we show her some numbers first.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She does seem pretty strict when it comes to things like that.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Right, then shall we gather all the information we have about the School Idol Festival and our past activities?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That sounds good. Let's split this task up and get to work!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Excuse me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Mifune?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Your voices can be heard quite clearly, even from outside. I suppose the volume of your voices is to be expected of school idols.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Grrr... Have you come all the way here to say mean things?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: K-Kasumi, calm down.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Unfortunately, I will have you all put an end to this farce of yours.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: No matter what you may show me, the School Idol Club will be abolished, as previously announced. Understood?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: E-Everyone, calm down. The School Idol Club has survived a near-death scare before, so I am sure we will be able to do so again!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: R-Right. You're right! I'll do my very best again!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yep, you're right! We won't let Mifune abolish us!
